title: section, to the likely effect of the amount to be specified in the following order
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) 

Act 2022 (Section 9(2)) (Amount of Financial Contribution) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 1 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (section 9(2)) (amount financial contribution) order 2025 (2) order shall come operation 1 june 2025

title: section, to the likely effect of the amount to be specified in the following order
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2022” means the Civil Law (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2022” means the Civil Law (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022).
text_norm: 2 order act 2022 mean civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (no 19 2022)

title: section, to the likely effect of the amount to be specified in the following order
heading: 3. The amount of €600 is specified for the purposes of section 9(1)(b) of
text_raw:
3. The amount of €600 is specified for the purposes of section 9(1)(b) of 

the Act of 2022. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4. The Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (Section 9(2)) 
(Amount of Financial Contribution) Order 2022 (S.I. No. 687 of 2022) is 
revoked. 

[228] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 May, 2025. 

DARA CALLEARY, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 May, 2025. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [228]
